name: Startup Validation Experiment Tracker
description: What is this:Two databases to track your validation experiments for your business hypotheses.The '#Visualise Your Experiments' board keeps your team aware of what experiments they are running to reduce the risk in your business. The '#Insights & Learnings' board tracks learnings from your various experiments How to use this: Click Duplicate in the top right of this page and select your notion workspace.
